title: Meet South Africa's youngest author
content:
, eight year-old Stacy Fru, who tells us all about her book Smelly Cats... 
South Africa’s youngest author speaks about her book Smelly Cats 
She's only eight years old but Stacy Fru is muli-talented. She loves sport, plays the guitar and still makes time for her friends. 

Writing is her favourite activity at school so she decided "Why not try to write my own book?" 

In this interview Stacy tells us about herself, the book and reads her favourite part out loud. 

There's also a sneak peak at her NEXT book - coming soon...
